page.title: 15Education in Sth Benfleet.
page.content: Numerous small private nursery schools cater for the pre_school child.From 5 to 11 children attend Primary Schools, maintained by the Essex C.C:South Benfleet,Jotmans and Kents Hill,or the Roman Catholic Primary School,The Holy Family.At eleven the children transfer to either the King John School or Appleton School,which are both Comprehensive Schools for boys and girls.A very small percentage of pupils sit a special examination called the 11+ which might enable them to attend a Grammar School in the neighbouring borough of Southend. Pupils who opt for further education attend the South East Essex Sixth Form College in Thundersley,or the Southend and Basildon Technical Colleges .
